introduction: SYNOPSISSuk-gi, a photographer, is taking some pictures when he meets Hye-kyung lost in the streets. He falls in love with her and the two share a happy life. Then Hye-kyung leaves their home and Suk-gi becomes self-destructive. Meanwhile, Hye-kyung gives a birth to Suk-gi's baby at an obstetrician's. She can't remember anything of her past. Hye-kyung doesn't remember her fiancee Seong-hun or the father of her daughter. She decides to look for the man who took care of her all this time. The gangster Kyung-su knows this and deceives Hye-kyung. They decide to get married. However, Seong-hun sees Hye-kyung's picture in a photo exhibition and learns the whole truth. He tells Hye-kyung everything. She looks for Suk-gi and they have an emotional reunion.故事作为一名摄影师，石is是仿照惠卿在街上徘徊时在照片中间漫步的。然后，惠慧逃跑，石吉找到了慧琼。我感到对惠庆的爱，他们和他们的孩子愉快地生活在一起。慧琼再次离家，stone is不驯，终身绝望。在一间产科诊所，慧琼生了一个石器时代的小孩，遇见了荣格，却不记得过去。一直担心自己未婚夫的慧琼和她的女儿找到了照顾她的男人。秀洙和慧琼决定结婚。曾经是未婚夫的胜云，在摄影展上看到了赫明的照片，并了解了一切事实。真诚向成顺听了真相的真英访问了石谷的家，石井和慧明重逢了。
